channel.title: Help please
channel.description: um... i have updated from moparscape 3.0 to moparscape 3.1. I have it dowloaded and ready to play but when i press "start server" it tell me that a new server has succefully started but when I go put in my username and password it says on top of where u enter user and pass "Error connecting to server.Must be down. Click "Cancel" then "Start Server" to make your own". I try to put one of the server fromt he list but is says the same thing what do i do??? :confused: :confused:

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @ToPNoTCH ToPNoTCH
item.description:
@ToPNoTCH wrote:

um… i have updated from moparscape 3.0 to moparscape 3.1. I have it dowloaded and ready to play but when i press “start server” it tell me that a new server has succefully started but when I go put in my username and password it says on top of where u enter user and pass “Error connecting to server.Must be down. Click “Cancel” then “Start Server” to make your own”. I try to put one of the server fromt he list but is says the same thing what do i do???

Read full topic
